title: Standards-based Writing Practice
explanation: While creating their story, students will strengthen their use of effective techniques, descriptive details, and clear event sequences.

title: Personalized Writing Feedback
explanation: Providing students individualized feedback on their own work is the most appropriate and effective approach to teach writing.

title: Online Testing Preparation
explanation: It’s never too soon to prepare students for the online testing environment where they’ll be expected to produce their best writing.

title: Transferable Writing Skills
explanation: Storywriting offers a plethora of transferable writing skills that will boost their ability in both fiction and non-fiction writing assignments.
